266  enum swizzle
267  {
268  SWIZZLE_RED = 0x1903, //GL_RED
269  SWIZZLE_GREEN = 0x1904, //GL_GREEN
270  SWIZZLE_BLUE = 0x1905, //GL_BLUE
271  SWIZZLE_ALPHA = 0x1906, //GL_ALPHA
272  SWIZZLE_ZERO = 0x0000, //GL_ZERO
273  SWIZZLE_ONE = 0x0001, //GL_ONE
274  };
275 
276  struct format
277  {
278  internalFormat Internal;
279  externalFormat External;
280  typeFormat Type;
281  swizzle Swizzle[4];
282  };
